summary:
Blast the ore right out of the rock! Adds a new property to the Flames spell which allows it to mine ore deposits. Note that dual-wield casting (NOT dual-casting) makes for much faster mining.

Credit to tgfighter at the skyrim nexus for making me try this out.
descriptionHtml:
Blast the ore right out of the rock! Adds a new property to the Flames spell which allows it to mine ore deposits. Note that dual-wield casting (NOT dual-casting) makes for much faster mining.

Credit to tgfighter at the skyrim nexus for making me try this out.


*** This mod will conflict with the following mods. You can have more than one mod enabled, but only one of the added methods (the last added) will be able to \"mine\" ore.
- Bound Tools
- Midas Magic\'s Bound Pickaxe spell

Please comment with any questions, feedback, requests, or bug reports!
author: Vonwarr
